title: ika kaavalasinadhEmi
sahitya:
ika kavalasinadEmi manasA sukhamuna nuNDavadEmin-



anupallavi



akhilANDa kOTi bramhANDa nAthu Dantarangamuna nelakoni uNDagan-



caraNam 1



mundaTi janmamulanu jEsina aghabrnda vipinamula kA-

     nanda kanduDaina sItApati nandakayutuDai uNDagan-



caraNam 2



kAmAdi lObha mOha mada stOma tamamamulakunu 

     sOma sUrya nEtruDaina shrI rAmacandruDai nI anDuNDagan-



caraNam 3



kSEmadi shubhamulanu tyAgarAja kAmitArthamulanu 

     nEmamuna niccu dayAnidhi rAmabhadruDu nIyauNDagan-
